name: Tigers
text:
I built the slow-volt spine,/ Vertebrae measured in mileage.

/ I placed its bones into/ Precise locales./ I minimized/ Severe disturbance.

/ I foresaw the coming/ Catastrophes,/ Which were well within/ The margin of error.

/ Blue is a relentless color,/ But the stones will not resist

/ (This time)

/ Arithmetic or logic./
